item.title: 162 bus not showing, 26th September
item.description:
162 bus towards Bexleheat is running but doesn't appear anymore both on the digital board at the Bromley South station bus stop and at Widmore Road Kentish Way station. Also the applications on the phone seems to have difficulty in seeing it. Time to time appens also with 269 same route no phone seeing it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, High Street, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin from 3 Marcia Road litter strewn, 26th September
item.description:
Waste from 3 Marcia Road’s bin has been spread across the pavement for 2 days and hasn’t been cleared. This is unhygienic and likely to attract pests to the area. Issue with litter from this bin being spread across the street has been a continuous issue for the last month.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marcia Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ranwell Passage covered in litter., 26th September
item.description:
Ranwell Passage has not been swept for a few weeks. It needs to be added to the street cleaner's rota, which I thought it had been. I cleaned the litter from the bottom half yesterday, when doing my fortnightly litter pick of Westdale Road and it's surrounds, but I shouldn't have to do the job of someone paid by the council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36-38, Herbert Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
